title: Asian Chicken Tacos Memorial Day
description: If you enjoy tacos, but are looking for a bit of a change up, then try this Asian Chicken Taco recipe from Sam the Cooking Guy.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-recipe/asian-chicken-tacos-recipe/
If you enjoy tacos, but are looking for a bit of a change up, then try this Asian Chicken Taco recipe from Sam the Cooking Guy.  Thank you for watching. Make sure you subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube channel.

transcripts:
[MUSIC Playing]
How about we start grilling season with grilled spicy chicken tacos? Start by combining Asian chili sauce, honey, and soy sauce. Mix well. Then add a little more chili sauce to some sour cream and shred some cabbage. We'll use this later. 

Lightly oil chicken thighs, season with kosher salt and place on a hot grill. Once you've flipped the chicken, start basting with the sauce and add a little more until cooked through. 

Just as the chicken is finishing, add some corn tortillas to the grill to get a little crispy. Slice the chicken, spread some of the sour cream on a tortilla, add the cabbage, the chicken, and finally a little chopped cilantro. 

Start your season by grilling something different. You'll be so glad you did.
